workflow.name: Qualify and route sales leads with Mistral-Saba AI and MCDM scoring
workflow.description:
## How It Works
The workflow starts with a scheduled trigger that activates at set intervals. Behavioral data from multiple sources is parsed and sent to the MCDN routing engine, which intelligently assigns leads to the right teams based on predefined rules. AI-powered scoring evaluates each prospect‚Äôs potential, ensuring high-quality leads are prioritized. The results are synced to the CRM, and updates are reflected on an analytics dashboard for real-time visibility.

## Setup Steps
1. **Trigger:** Define schedule frequency.
2. **Data Fetch:** Configure APIs for all behavioral data sources.
3. **MCDN Router:** Set routing rules, thresholds, and team assignments.
4. **AI Models:** Connect OpenAI/NVIDIA APIs and configure scoring prompts.
5. **CRM Integration:** Enter credentials for Salesforce, HubSpot, or other CRMs.
6. **Dashboard:** Link to analytics tools like Tableau or Google Sheets for reporting.

## Prerequisites
API credentials: NVIDIA AI, OpenAI, CRM platform; data sources; spreadsheet/analytics access

## Use Cases
Lead prioritization for sales teams; customer segmentation; automated routing; 

## Customization
Adjust routing rules, add custom scoring models, modify team assignments, expand data sources, integrate additional AI providers

## Benefits
Reduces manual lead routing 90%; improves scoring accuracy; accelerates sales cycle; enables data-driven team assignments;

workflow.name: Qualify and Route Sales Leads with Mistral-Saba AI and MCDM Scoring

parameters.text: You are an expert lead qualification analyst. Analyze the provided lead data with MCDM scores and provide a comprehensive qualification assessment. Consider demographic fit, behavioral engagement, transactional history, and overall score. Provide actionable insights for sales teams including key strengths, potential objections, recommended approach, and priority level. Use the enrichLeadData tool to gather additional context.

parameters.description: Enriches lead data with additional context and insights based on MCDM scores

parameters.content:
## How It Works
The workflow starts with a scheduled trigger that activates at set intervals. Behavioral data from multiple sources is parsed and sent to the MCDN routing engine, which intelligently assigns leads to the right teams based on predefined rules. AI-powered scoring evaluates each prospect‚Äôs potential, ensuring high-quality leads are prioritized. The results are synced to the CRM, and updates are reflected on an analytics dashboard for real-time visibility.

## Setup Steps
1. **Trigger:** Define schedule frequency.
2. **Data Fetch:** Configure APIs for all behavioral data sources.
3. **MCDN Router:** Set routing rules, thresholds, and team assignments.
4. **AI Models:** Connect OpenAI/NVIDIA APIs and configure scoring prompts.
5. **CRM Integration:** Enter credentials for Salesforce, HubSpot, or other CRMs.
6. **Dashboard:** Link to analytics tools like Tableau or Google Sheets for reporting.

## Prerequisites
API credentials: NVIDIA AI, OpenAI, CRM platform; data sources; spreadsheet/analytics access

## Use Cases
Lead prioritization for sales teams; customer segmentation; automated routing;

## Customization
Adjust routing rules, add custom scoring models, modify team assignments, expand data sources

## Benefits
Reduces manual lead routing 90%; improves scoring accuracy; accelerates sales cycle

## Fetch Behavioral Data





































Retrieves multi-source lead information: form submissions, website interactions, email engagement, past purchase signals
Why: Rich behavioral data reveals intent

## Parse Multi-Format Inputs













Standardizes data from different sources (APIs, spreadsheets, webhooks, forms) into consistent structure
Why: email parsing ensures AI and routing engine work with clean, normalized information

## MCDN Route














Routes leads to the right sales teams using account size, industry, region, product interests.
**Why:** Ensures reps focus on the right opportunities

## AI Scores Lead Quality
Analyzes behavioral, transactional, and firmographic data to rank leads by conversion probability
Why: AI scoring reveals which prospects are sales-ready

## Assign to Specialized Team
Routes qualified lead to the right team: enterprise, mid-market, SMB, or vertical specialist based on scoring and routing rules
Why:  proper assignment cuts sales cycle time and improves close rates

## Sync Assignment Metadata
Captures which team received the lead, reasoning for routing, and AI confidence score in CRM fields
Why: Understand why a lead went to team A instead of B, and refine rules based on outcomes

## Generate Performance Dashboard & Log
Compiles metrics: leads processed, quality distribution, routing accuracy, team assignment rates, conversion tracking
Why: Transforms individual routing decisions into strategic visibility

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.
